body: $AAPL  🍏 “Surge” in AfterHours Volume, 4.9 Million.

@Pedro_Dickey @aby1 that ain’t it, this correction was long overdue…if we zoom out & look @ charts like $MSFT or $AAPL on a 5Year time range, it seems a little more clear what’s going on for the next leg up eventhough this plunge was brutal & out of nowhere after 3 straight days of gap ups & bullishness with no catalysts…we were kind of expecting negativity & pain on Monday/Fed Powell meeting Tuesday & we rallied like nothing happen 👀  this was the first day Nasdaq went red since & it retraced half the rally from Monday

body: $AAPL Everyone wondering what’s going on this is the tank before the earnings run. Pretty simple, go back and look at last years charts. Christmas sales were through the roof, this will make a 20-30 point run between tomorrow and the 25th, then sell off after earnings… Rinse and repeat.
$AAPL  🍏 In the “final second” of the Close, 8.7 Million AAPL Shares traded to the “Buy Side”.  Nice Volume in AfterHours, 3.4 Million Shares traded.

@1centstamp $GOOG has a PEG < 1 whereas $AAPL ~ 4. 
I agree that aapl should drop by 50% to become a compelling stock, but not Google.
